amendment.description: To strike the provisions relating to clarifying a memorandum of understanding between the Federal Aviation Administration and the Occupational Safety and Health Administration.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 18 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 22.

Amendment SA 18 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S625-626; text: CR S626) To strike the provisions relating to clarifying a memorandum of understanding between the Federal Aviation Administration and the Occupational Safety and Health Administration.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 18 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 22.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 18 proposed by Senator Paul.
